title: Letterhead ID
content:
Can anyone help me identify this typeface?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804112807im_/http:/typophile.com/files/photo%20(9)_6679.JPG)
author: williamfox

comments.content: [Blair](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804112807/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/blair/) for the name and perhaps Copperplate (you decide which versions/weights) for the remainder?
